name: Hit Search
tagline: Delivered with Honest, Creativity and ROI
description:
We are honest and accountable, strategic and creative, digital marketing experts. Since 2007, we have been building a creative, vibrant and hard working team of specialists in SEO, PPC, content marketing, social media, conversion rate optimization, and mobile services. We also offer “Little Birdy,” our real-time brand scanning software.  
 
All of our clients benefit from real time reporting dashboards that enables clients to view, at a glance, how their websites are performing and how we are performing against agreed targets.
 
Based in Liverpool, London and Manchester, the Hit Search team comes together to create an agency with vast experience in the Digital Marketing industry. We know what turns a search into a visitor, and a visitor into a customer.
